about_the_game:
THIS IS OUR EARLY ACCESS WHICH HAS LIMITED CONTENT


Nexus station is still in early development and not yet feature-complete. We will be adding features and content to the game as we develop it further. By joining our Early Access, you help us as developers to check and validate some technical aspects, and gather feedback on our project.

A NEW KIND OF SOCIAL SANDBOX MMO


We are developing a one-of-a-kind cross-platform Social Sandbox MMO with endless possibilities; from crafting, world creation, PvE, PvP, competitive gameplay and more. You’ll be able to create your own worlds, levels, and even make official playable content for the community. We look forward to sharing more with you as the game develops!

BUILD WORLDS WITH OUR LEVEL EDITOR


Create and edit your own worlds and explore the worlds made by your friends! We will choose player-made worlds to feature as official competitive and co-op features for the wider community.

COMPETE FOR YOUR BEST TIME IN PARKOUR


Race in our daily parkour worlds, or create your own parkour worlds for others to compete in.

SHOOT THE HOOPS WITH YOUR FRIENDS


Work with your team to score as many points as you can in our shoot the hoops feature. Enter the portals from the Hub World to play the official hoops worlds!

BE A PART OF THE COMMUNITY


Join our online community on Discord and Instagram where you can get the latest updates on the game and hang out with the community.

name: Nexus Station

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core 2.6GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Social First are bringing you a brand new kind of social sandbox MMO! In our free-to-play cross-platform game, you can create your own worlds and challenge your friends to epic adventures. Craft and collect items, create clans, and take part in our exciting events. Join our awesome community now!
